channel.title: Error loging in
channel.description: So I solved the cache problem but now my friends cant log in I have setted the ip to localhost but it wont work what should I make it? My ip?

item.title: Error loging in
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Your friends need to connect to your IP, so they require a client with YOUR IP (or your no-ip, same shit basically) in it.

YOU play on localhost because YOU are on the same pc as the server. So you are ‘local’ to the ‘host’, a.k.a localhost.

Read full topic

a picture would help but oh well hmm try no-ip or could be because of error in jar client maybe you didn’t jar correctly sorry if i couldn’t help a lot
